parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: SectionLabel
parameters.description: Letter for the label for the section view

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options that affect the section view as defined in swCreateSectionViewAtOptions_e

parameters.name: NumExcludedComponents
parameters.description: Number of components to exclude from the section view

parameters.name: ExcludedComponents
parameters.description: Array of components to exclude from the section view

parameters.name: SectionDepth
parameters.description: Distance from the section line to create the section view

title: IDrawingDoc.ICreateSectionViewAt5
description: Creates a section view from the section line up to the specified distance at the specified distance.
signature:
View ICreateSectionViewAt5( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
,
   System.String
SectionLabel
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.Int32
NumExcludedComponents
,
   ref System.Object
ExcludedComponents
,
   System.Double
SectionDepth
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z position on the drawing sheet for the center of the section view

parameters.name: SectionLabel
parameters.description: Letter for the label for the section view

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options that affect the section view as defined in swCreateSectionViewAtOptions_e

parameters.name: NumExcludedComponents
parameters.description: Number of components to exclude from the section view

parameters.name: ExcludedComponents
parameters.description: Array of components to exclude from the section view

parameters.name: SectionDepth
parameters.description: Distance from the section line to create the section view

remarks:
Before calling this method, select the section line or lines to use as a section line.
This method runs silently; the end-user is not prompted for a label.
Use
IView::IGetSection
to get the
IDrSection
object, and use
IDrSection::SetLabel2
to set the name for the label, which provides a warning if the name is a duplicate and the standard does not accept duplicate names.
